snippet.title: Class of Heroes 1 & 2: Complete Edition | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
A HD remaster of these two classic dungeon crawlers! Choose from different classes and courses to create your ideal cohort of students and build a fearsome team. With help from your teachers, become the ultimate adventurer and overcome the challenging dungeons!

Available to Buy Now!
Class of Heroes Anniversary Edition: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2195780/Class_of_Heroes_Anniversary_Edition/
Class of Heroes 2G Remaster Edition: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2195790/Class_of_Heroes_2G_Remaster_Edition/

Buy Now: https://pqube.co.uk/games/class-of-heroes-1-2-complete-edition/

Follow PQube Games on social media!
